review: Clinic is kept very neat and well maintained. Dr.Maheshwari is very kind and friendly who diagnosis the problems and prescribes the required tests and provides solutions. She is like a hidden gem and because of her we are blessed with baby. Me and my wife are really thankful to her to the core.

We wanted an advice on having a second baby. She didn't tell us anything but insisted for the scanning directly.  She was not at all interested in giving advice otherthan convincing us to go for the scan. We felt very bad.
